conversations.content: Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

<function_thought>

</function_thought>

<function_call>[search_calendar_events(query="Dental check-up")]</function_call>

<function_thought>
I found a calendar event for a Dental check-up titled "Dentist Appointment" scheduled for 2024-05-18 at 09:00. However, the user wants to reschedule this to 2024-05-20 at 10:00. I have the event ID (`5`) required for rescheduling. Now, I will execute the `reschedule_calendar_event` function with the new date and time.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[reschedule_calendar_event(event_id="5", new_start_time="2024-05-20 10:00", new_end_time=None)]</function_call>
